Form

This page shows you an example form and all it's form elements and controls with basic/default UI set in place. Fieldsets are visually hidden by default. If you give a form fieldset the class 'ui-fieldset-present' it will be visible explicitly with a border.

ARIA attributes

Aria attributes are present to facilitate and help those browsing with special software. Currently the following examples are present:

  • aria-required to indicate an input field is a required field
  • aria-invalid to use when validation shows the input field does not have a valid value
  • aria-describedby to use when the validated input field with an error has an error description in an element with that ID

Example succes message
Thank you submitting this form. We'll contact you shortly!

Example error message
There are errors in the form fields. Please review your submission in the fields below.
